name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Exclusive: Texas fund EMG halts new deals with indicted McClendon

content: ATLANTA/WASHINGTON Aubrey McClendon  former chief executive officer of Chesapeake Energy Corp  and a legend in the U.S. energy industry  was charged on Tuesday with conspiring to rig bids to buy oil and natural gas leases in Oklahoma  the Justice Department said.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Former Chesapeake CEO McClendon charged with bid-rigging of land leases

content: Chesapeake Energy Corp  the second largest U.S. natural gas producer  said it would make a debt payment due in March and that it planned to sell more assets  slash spending in half and renegotiate pipeline contracts as it aims to lower debt and improve liquidity amid collapsing energy prices.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake aims to cut debt  spending amid oil slump

content: * Sets 2016 capex of $1.3 bln-$1.8 bln  down 57 pct from 2015
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Chesapeake aims to cut debt  spending amid oil slump

content: * Chesapeake CEO says expects continued pressure on commodity prices in 2016
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: BRIEF-Chesapeake will look for opportunities to buy back debt at a discount-CEO

content: Feb 24 U.S. natural gas producer Chesapeake Energy Corp forecast lower capital spending for 2016 and said it would sell more assets worth $500 million-$1 billion.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake sets lower capex for 2016  to sell more assets

content: HOUSTON  Feb 25 U.S. shale producer Chesapeake Energy Corp on Thursday said debt downgrades from ratings agencies in December have its counterparties including pipeline companies asking for collateral as the downturn in crude prices lingers.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake says parties seeking collateral after debt downgrade

content: Chesapeake Energy  the No. 2 U.S. natural gas producer  said on Monday it had no plans to file for bankruptcy  after sources told Reuters the company had asked its longtime counsel to look at restructuring options.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake moves to quash bankruptcy fears as shares plunge

content: Feb 8 Natural gas producer Chesapeake Energy  has tapped existing adviser Kirkland & Ellis to explore restructuring options  people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: CORRECTED-Chesapeake Energy taps restructuring lawyers - sources

content: Dec 9 The Pennsylvania Attorney General's office on Wednesday said it filed a lawsuit against Chesapeake Energy Corp and its affiliates over claims that the companies underpaid landowners who leased land for fracking.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Pennsylvania sues Chesapeake over fracking leases with landowners

content: Chesapeake Energy Corp  cut its 2015 capital budget for the second time this year to cope with low oil and gas prices and swung to a large quarterly net loss as the second largest U.S. producer of natural gas wrote down the value of assets.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake cuts budget again on weak oil and gas prices

content: * Shares down 5 percent   (Updates share price  adds details from conference call)
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Chesapeake cuts budget again on weak oil and gas prices

content: Nov 4 U.S. natural gas producer Chesapeake Energy Corp reported a quarterly loss  compared with a year-ago profit  as it wrote down the value of some oil and gas assets by $5.42 billion.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake Energy posts Q3 loss on $5.42 bln charge

content: The federal government has levied a $2.1 million fine against Chesapeake Energy Corporation  saying the oil and gas company failed to update inaccurate production reports used to assess the royalties it pays for drilling on American Indian land.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake fined $2.1 million over inaccurate royalty reports

content: HOUSTON  Oct 12 Chesapeake Energy Corp  the second largest U.S. producer of natural gas  on Monday said current director and former Saks Inc Chief Executive Brad Martin has been named non-executive chairman of its board  effective immediately.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake Energy board member Martin named chairman

content: HOUSTON Chesapeake Energy Corp said on Tuesday it has cut about 15 percent of its workforce  or 740 jobs  as depressed oil and gas prices force deeper cost cutting at the U.S. No. 2 natural gas producer.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake cuts 15 percent of workforce on oil slump

content: HOUSTON  Sept 29 Chesapeake Energy Corp  said on Tuesday it has cut about 15 percent of its workforce  or 740 jobs  as depressed oil and gas prices force deeper cost cutting at the U.S. No. 2 natural gas producer.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Chesapeake cuts 15 percent of workforce on oil slump

content: NEW YORK  July 16 A federal judge on Thursday said Chesapeake Energy Corp must pay an additional $59.1 million to some investors whose bonds it redeemed early  boosting the natural gas company's total payout to $438.7 million.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake Energy bond payout raised to $438.7 million

content: NEW YORK A U.S. federal judge on Friday ordered Chesapeake Energy Corp to pay $379.7 million to bond investors  after the natural gas company waited too long to tell them of its plan to redeem their $1.3 billion of bonds six years early.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake Energy ordered to pay $379.7 million in bond dispute

content: July 1 FourPoint Energy LLC  a private exploration and production company  said it would buy oil and gas assets from units of Chesapeake Energy Corp for $840 million to increase its footprint in the Western Anadarko basin in Oklahoma.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: FourPoint Energy to buy oil and gas assets from units of Chesapeake

content: HOUSTON  May 6 Devon Energy Corp and Chesapeake Energy Corp  said on Wednesday they see an opportunity to produce more natural gas in the Barnett Shale in Texas with a second round of fracking on older wells.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Devon  Chesapeake see refracking prospects in Barnett wells in Texas

content: Chesapeake Energy Corp  on Wednesday raised its oil and gas production forecast for the year  even as the second largest U.S. producer of natural gas reported a quarterly loss due to lower commodity prices.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake Energy posts first-quarter loss  sees more output

content: Energy & Minerals Group  a major investor in new oil and gas ventures launched by former Chesapeake Energy Corp CEO Aubrey McClendon  said on Tuesday it has settled a lawsuit alleging the oil executive stole his former employer's trade secrets.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: AEP investor settles Chesapeake lawsuit targeting ex: CEO

content: March 23 Activist investor Carl Icahn raised his stake in Chesapeake Energy Corp to almost 11 percent even as the company continues to cope with low oil and gas prices.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Icahn raises stake in Chesapeake Energy to 11 pct

content: HOUSTON/WILLISTON  N.D. With the prospect of another plunge in crude prices  looming after two months of stability  U.S. shale oil producers may face another round of spending cuts to conserve cash and survive the downturn.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: U.S. shale oil firms brace for more pain as crude resumes slide

content: HOUSTON  Feb 27 Chesapeake Energy Corp  on Friday said in a regulatory filing it expects to write-down the value of its oil and gas properties in the first quarter  citing low oil and gas prices.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake Energy sees asset writedowns in Q1-filing

content: Chesapeake Energy Corp  on Wednesday said it would slash its 2015 spending and rig count in response to low crude oil prices that also pushed its fourth-quarter profit below Wall Street expectations.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake profit falls short; company to slash spending

name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake Energy has quarterly profit  slashing spending

content: OKLAHOMA CITY Chesapeake Energy Corp filed suit Tuesday alleging its founder and former chief executive  Aubrey K. McClendon  stole confidential company data during his last months on the job in order to launch his new oil and gas empire.
name: Chesapeake Energy Corporation
title: Chesapeake alleges founder McClendon stole "trade secrets" to start new firm
